import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {User} from "../models/user"; import {AuthService} from "../auth.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-userregister', templateUrl: './user-register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-register.component.css'] }) export class UserRegisterComponent { model : any; constructor(private authService: AuthService) { } submitRegister(){ alert(this.model.email) //this.authService.addUser(this.model); } }
